tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Energy_Storage (
  id INT,
  device_id INT,
  storage_capacity DECIMAL,
  regulatory_standard VARCHAR(100),
  installation_date DATE,
  PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_storage_products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
    capacity DECIMAL,
    regulatory_compliance BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE energy_storage_sites (
    site_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    site_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    capacity DECIMAL,
    regulatory_certification VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    facility_id INT,
    agency_id INT,
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyUsageLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    consumer_id INT NOT NULL,
    facility_id INT NOT NULL,
    usage_date DATE NOT NULL,
    consumption DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_consumer FOREIGN KEY (consumer_id) REFERENCES EnergyConsumers(consumer_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_facility FOREIGN KEY (facility_id) REFERENCES EnergyStorageFacilities(facility_id)
);
